properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
COTE D'IVOIRE.
PIRACY.
222 METER M/V ORFEAS, GREY HULL, 24 PERSONS ON BOARD,
POSSIBLY HIJACKED IN 05-12.56N 004-03.68W ON 06 OCT.
VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
